entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
